com.mpos.lottery.te.valueaddservice.airtime.support

类 AbstractAirtimeProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mpos.lottery.te.valueaddservice.airtime.support.AbstractAirtimeProvider
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AirtimeProvider, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    直接已知子类:
    CooBillAirtimeProvider, SmartAirtimeProvider

    public abstract class AbstractAirtimeProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements AirtimeProvider, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    The auto-register AirtimeProvider implementation, all sub-implementations should inherit from this class. The instance must be spring managed, then spring framework will register the instance of sub-implementation to AirtimeProviderFactory instance.

      • generateRefNo

        protected java.lang.String generateRefNo()
        Generate a unique reference No. whose length must be less than 19. It will be nanoseconds + (4 random number).
